desc: Like a bralette, the Skarlette® is designed as an attractive item of underwear for women who have had their breasts removed due to breast cancer. Specifically designed for comfort with a deeper soft under-band, deeper side panels and super soft materials, caring for sensitivity and scarring.

layout.text: Designed for flat women, by flat women
Discover the Skarlette collection. Sophisticated, post-surgical lingerie stitched with love in the UK.
